price: And [consider] the Day when Allah’s enemies will be gathered to the Fire, driven in rows.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُحۡشَرُ أَعۡدَآءُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ
